title: Cash Reserve Review & Stagnation Veto Consideration

reasoning.problem: Review cash reserves relative to Net Asset Value (NAV). Current cash reserves are $1311.75. If these reserves exceed 20% of NAV (suspect > $6558.75), a FORCE_DEPLOY directive, as per Article III Section 2, is necessary to break the stasis. Recommend an appropriate strategy to break the stasis if NAV confirms.
